ModMetaData.name: [1001]Un-Anaesthetic
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds pills which, when fed to a pawn, neutralizes anaesthetic.
I like to modify my pawns extensively, but then I get tired of them sleeping and being drowsy. I would call it Wake-Up, but...
Balance? What's that?
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at: https://github.com/papercrane1001/-1001-Un-Anaesthetic
\n\nVersion 1.0.1 \nFor version 1.3, 1.4, 1.5
